name: Siddhartha’s Dream
description: Siddhartha’s Dream by Ganesh Collective is a stimulating hybrid strain that crosses Lemon Dream and Buddha’s Tooth. These genetics incorporate the heady, uplifting sensations of Blue Dream from both parents, giving Siddhartha’s Dream a happy, heady quality. The flavor incorporates the zestiness of Lemon Dream and the diesel notes of Buddha’s Tooth to create a spicy and flavorful flower.
descriptionPlain: Siddhartha’s Dream by Ganesh Collective is a stimulating hybrid strain that crosses Lemon Dream and Buddha’s Tooth. These genetics incorporate the heady, uplifting sensations of Blue Dream from both parents, giving Siddhartha’s Dream a happy, heady quality. The flavor incorporates the zestiness of Lemon Dream and the diesel notes of Buddha’s Tooth to create a spicy and flavorful flower.
